text:
Spring break: It’s the one event college students look forward to all year. After being locked away in the classroom or your tiny (yet well-appointed) dorm room, you can’t wait to escape the stress of school and embark on an adventure! Whether you’re headed to Florida, Tulum, or Cancun with your besties or staycationing at your pal’s pool, now that you’ve got a destination, the next thing you need to focus on is what to bring on spring break.



To help you prepare for your upcoming travels (we know you’re eager to get to that tropical destination, volunteer location, or cozy home to hunker down in), we composed the ultimate college spring break packing list so you can fret less and focus your attention on having fun (or doing good) in the sun. Our must-haves include skincare staples to help you glow all week long, cute bathing suits and maxis for après-beach, and of course, a binge-worthy book.

BEAUTY BAG

Skincare

A lightweight gel-cream moisturizer to keep your skin glowing all day

Sunscreen (aim for SPF 30 or higher!)

A gentle cleanser to clean and refresh your face

Pimple patches to stop blemishes in their tracks

Face masks for those relaxation days

A lip mask to keep your pout hydrated

A cleansing balm to dissolve all of your vacay makeup ~lewks~

Makeup

A 24-hour, full-coverage foundation with a matte finish that also acts as skincare (it’s built with three serum technology to visibly improve bare skin over time)

A travel-friendly eyeshadow palette

Liquid blush for that sunkissed glow (without the sun)

Your fave concealer to cover up any blemishes or discoloration

A buildable mascara for lush, bold lashes

A shimmery bronzer to warm up your complexion

Eyebrow gel to keep your brows polished and in place

Reusable makeup removing wipes (so you don’t have to worry about running out)

A setting spray to lock in your look

A go-to lip color that can be worn from day to night

Brushes and a beauty blender (and any other tools you use to apply your makeup!)

ETC.

Shampoo, conditioner, and soap

Dry shampoo to keep your vacay hair looking flawless in between washes

Deodorant

Toothbrush and toothpaste

Razor and shaving cream

Hairbrush

Hairstyling tools (i.e. hairdryer and curling iron for those beach waves)

Hair ties

Tweezers to tame your brows or deal with boardwalk splinters

A mini first-aid kit

Feminine hygiene products (even if it’s not your time of the month, it can’t hurt to have supplies on hand for your besties)

Living Proof Mini Perfect hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo, $18 Shop Now Welly Quick Fix First Aid Kit (2 Pack), $14 Shop Now Quip Adult Electric Toothbrush with Travel Cover, $24 Shop Now

CLOTHES

Tip: Make the most of your break by choosing pieces that can be mixed and matched to create a bunch of looks!

Day dresses

Going-out dresses

A breezy matching set

Crop tops

A lightweight sweater (for chillier nights)

A midi skirt

A mini skirt

Denim shorts

Bathing suits

Beach coverups

Flowy beach pants

Loungewear

Comfy slides (for chilling by the pool or on the sand)

Platform heels (so you can look good without hurting your feet on nights out)

Neutral sneakers

A beach-ready tote bag

A chic clutch (to hold your going-out essentials)

A wide-brim hat

A baseball cap

Beach Bag

Tip: Get double duty out of your oversized beach bag by using it as your carry-on/personal item for traveling to your spring break destination. Plus, it’ll ensure you have all your important items next to you at all times.

Ticket(s) (for traveling and any events you’re attending)

Cell phone

ID (if you’re staying within the U.S., use your driver’s license, or if you’re traveling abroad, bring your passport!)

Sunglasses

Medications

Gum

Wallet (keep some cash on you in case you run into any issues with your cards)

Snacks

Reusable water bottle (make sure it’s empty if you’re going through airport security!)

Antibacterial gel

Headphones

A bathing suit and cover-up (in case your luggage gets delayed!)

Miscellaneous

Beach towel

Disposable camera (so you don’t have to worry about your phone or nice camera getting sandy or wet!)

Chargers (get a cheap portable phone charger for long days at the beach or while you’re en route)

A good beach read

Koozies (may you always have a cool—and cute!—drink in your hand)

Plastic bag or waterproof pouch for your wet swimsuit

Corkscrew

Check off all the items on this list and you’ll be sure to have the best. spring. break. ever. Happy vacay!

title: Your Ultimate Spring Break Packing List For 2023

meta_data.description: Whether you’re headed to Florida with your besties or another tropical locale, here are the must-haves to pack for your ultimate college spring break.
